name: understanding-transpilers-and-bundlers
description: Playground to understand the code generated from different transpilers.

scripts.transpile:closure:arrow-functions: google-closure-compiler src/arrow-functions.js --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > dst/closure/arrow-functions.js
scripts.transpile:closure:export-default: google-closure-compiler src/export-default.js --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > dst/closure/export-default.js
scripts.transpile:closure:import-default: google-closure-compiler src/import-default.js src/export-default.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > dst/closure/import-default.js
scripts.transpile:closure:export-named: google-closure-compiler src/export-named.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > dst/closure/export-named.js
scripts.transpile:closure:import-named: google-closure-compiler src/import-named.js src/export-named.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > dst/closure/import-named.js
scripts.transpile:closure:export-default-and-nam: google-closure-compiler src/export-default-and-named.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > dst/closure/export-default-and-named.js
scripts.transpile:closure:import-default-and-nam: google-closure-compiler src/import-default-and-named.js src/export-default.js src/export-default-and-named.js --module_resolution=NODE --formatting PRINT_INPUT_DELIMITER --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --formatting PRETTY_PRINT > dst/closure/import-default-and-named.js

author: nosolosw
